testcase.classname: Launching on to the Tutorials Ninja home page and go to the register page
testcase.name: User launching the Tutorials Ninja Home Page
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the browser and user is in the Tutorial ninja home page...passed Then User should redirect to the Tutorials Ninja Home Page..................passed

testcase.classname: Launching on to the Tutorials Ninja home page and go to the register page
testcase.name: User is redirecting to the Tutorials Ninja Register Page
testcase.system-out: When User clicks register from myaccount dropdown...........................passed Then User should redirect to the Tutorials Ninja register page..............passed

testcase.name: the user has to be registered successfully

failure.message: expected:<...nt Has Been Created![]> but was:<...nt Has Been Created![ Congratulations! Your new account has been successfully created! You can now take advantage of member privileges to enhance your online shopping experience with us. If you have ANY questions about the operation of this online shop, please e-mail the store owner. A confirmation has been sent to the provided e-mail address. If you have not received it within the hour, please contact us. Continue]>

testcase.failure:
Given The user is in the register page......................................passed When the user clicks continue button after giving the details using "RegisterValid" and "Register".passed Then the user has to be registered successfully.............................failed
